characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: During deployment, you can set up this model in disguise instead of placing it on the battlefield.  At the end of any Movement phases this model can revert to its true form - set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than D6+3" away from any enemy models.  For example if you roll a 4, the model can be set up anywhere that is more than 7" from any enemy model.
